short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert PDF files to HTML documents, just navigate to the PDF file and use GrabzIt.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Convert any PDF document to a HTML file automatically, this application uses heuristic rules to generate the HTML file. While the results aren't an exact representation of the PDF file, due to the complexities of reading a PDF file it will be a close approximation.

To do this the application reads the content of the PDF file currently open in the web browser and sends it to GrabzIt's API for conversion before automatically downloading it to your computer.

Once you have installed your extension just follow the instructions in the extension popup to sign up and get converting! 

When you create an account the free trial includes seven days of complete functionality afterwards some text will be replaced with upgrade text.
